title: Glottography dataset derived from Bouckaert et al. 2012 "Mapping the origins and expansion of the Indo-European language family"
description: This dataset provides overlapping, approximate ranges for contemporary **and** ancient Indo-European languages as described and published with Bouckaert et al. 2012.
citation: Bouckaert, Remco, Philippe Lemey, Michael Dunn, Simon J Greenhill, Alexander V Alekseyenko, Alexei J Drummond, Russell D Gray & Quentin D Suchard Marc A and Atkinson. 2012. Mapping the origins and expansion of the Indo-European language family. Science 337(6097). 957–960. American Association for the Advancement of Science.
